title: Can a Pixel 4 show the latest contact information for each caller?
content:
My Samsung 7 Edge has a feature that "show the latest contact information for each caller"
In other words, when someone phones me, the dialing screen would show a brief call and/or text history of that number. This came in handy when business clients were phoning and/or texting me. 
Does Pixel 4 have this feature, or does anyone know of an app that would be able to perform this task?
